tool_description: IPSpector is an IP blacklist API, the goal of this API is to check a given IP reputation. This reputation is based on public blacklists,machine learning algorithms and IP Geolocation.
name: IPBlacklistAI
title: IPBlacklistAI

api_list.name: checkIP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ipblacklistai.p.rapidapi.com/checkIP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipblacklistai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ipblacklistai.p.rapidapi.com/checkIP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipblacklistai.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
